titles.title: Charity Care Tax Deduction for Physicians Act of 2012
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for charity care provided by physicians.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 5/18/2012--Introduced. Charity Care Tax Deduction for Physicians Act of 2012 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a physician a tax deduction equal to the amount such physician would have otherwise charged for charity medical care provided on a volunteer or pro bono basis. Limits the allowable amount of such deduction to 10% of such physician's gross income for the taxable year.
